projectName: Time Series Forecasting and KPI Analysis for Big Data Consulting
summary: Collaborative research project focused on analyzing and forecasting client performance indicators using time series models and Python-based data tools.
description: This project was a partnership between the SPLab research group at the Universidade Federal de Campina Grande and Siteware, a Brazilian consulting company specializing in Big Data. The project aimed to analyze and model performance indicators from Siteware's clients to extract insights and support decision-making.
roleDescription: Contributed to data analysis tasks by supporting graduate students and researchers. Participated in time series modeling, visualizations, and reporting over 8 months on a 20-hour weekly basis.

additionalRoles.title: Time Series Researcher
additionalRoles.text: Explored and tested forecasting models for time series data using libraries such as Prophet, statsmodels, and scikit-learn.

additionalRoles.title: Data Visualization Assistant
additionalRoles.text: Helped create data visualizations to support the interpretation and presentation of client KPIs.

additionalRoles.title: Reporting Contributor
additionalRoles.text: Assisted in preparing bi-weekly presentation materials to communicate project results to the Siteware team.
